Package ai.harmony.ravel.compiler.ir

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AliasAnalysis
    Compute an approximate may-alias relation for record type variables We say that two record variables x and y may-alias if there is a way for them to point to the same record.
    AstToUntypedIRVisitor
    Created by gcampagn on 1/20/17.
    CompileToIRPass
    Compile each event from symbols to TypedIR in SSA form Created by gcampagn on 1/20/17.
    ConstantFolding
    Created by gcampagn on 2/15/17.
    ConstantFolding.ConstantState  
    CopyPropagation
    Created by gcampagn on 2/16/17.
    DeadControlFlowElimination
    Eliminate if statements with constant branches Created by gcampagn on 2/16/17.
    DeadStoreEliminationPass
    Like dead value elimination, but also eliminates field stores to records that don't alias The goal is to eliminate dumb code that sets a field but does not save the record, which would confuse the operation analysis Created by gcampagn on 2/15/17.
    DeadValueEliminationPass
    Eliminates instructions with no side effects that compute unused values.
    IntoSSAPass
    Convert the IR into SSA form, renaming the registers and adding any necessary phi nodes To convert into SSA, we first compute reaching definitions for each variable at the start of each block.
    IntoSSAPass.Definition  
    IntoSSAPass.PhiNode  
    LowerIRPass
    Lower IR before it is consumed by code generation backends.
    OptimizePass
    Wrap all IR optimizations in a single pass Created by gcampagn on 2/21/17.
    OutofSSAPass
    Converts an IR in SSA form into an IR with no phi nodes The algorithm is pretty simple: for every phi node, we know which basic block the value comes from, so we add a move from phi source to the phi dest at the end of that block Created by gcampagn on 2/8/17.
    Registers
    Created by gcampagn on 1/23/17.
    TypeResolvePass
    Converts tree-like UntypedIR to TypedIR, checking the type of expressions and converting to control flow graph in the process Created by gcampagn on 1/23/17.
    UnusedVariableRemovalPass
    Removes (undeclares) variables that are completely unused.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BinaryOperation
    Created by gcampagn on 1/23/17.
    ComparisonOperation
    Created by gcampagn on 1/23/17.
    ConstantFolding.ConstantState.Level  
    UnaryOperation
    Created by gcampagn on 1/23/17.
